reset.done: An email was sent to your address with instructions on how to reset your password.
reset_now.redirect: You will be redirected to the login screen in a few seconds...
signup.done: An email was sent to your address with the final instrucstions to create a new account.
signup.completed: New account registration is now complete, you can now login with your account
other: Or sign in as a different user...
securitytoken: Please touch the flashing security token
securitytoken.error: Security token was invalid or operation was cancelled. Try with One Time Password instead...
securitytoken.unavailable: Cannot use security token on this server. Use One Time Password instead...
